function_call.name: classify_mitigation

procedures to ensure accuracy and consistency"},{"name":"Use accurate room-change time scale calculations, consider professional guidance"},{"name":"Evaluate and update existing infrastructure and international cooperation"},{"name":"Increased cleaning and disinfection protocols"},{"name":"Implementation of ventilation systems to control airflow between micro spaces, and the use of employees"},{"name":"Promotion and education about germ theory and evidence-based disease transmission knowledge."},{"name":"Ensure comprehensive and diverse data sources, address bias and limitations
